mapper.select: SELECT s.StoreID as StoreID, st.StoreName as StoreName, s.GoodsID as GoodsID, g.Name as Name, SUM (s.Quantity) AS Quantity FROM Stock s LEFT JOIN Stores st on st.StoreID = s.StoreID LEFT JOIN Goods g on g.GoodsID = s.GoodsID WHERE s.Quantity >= 1 GROUP BY s.StoreID, s.GoodsID,st.StoreName,g.Name order by Quantity desc
